description:
Thanatos is a new platform designed to provide assistance in all aspects of a death: inheritances, wakes, burials, cremations, last wills...and made with technological tools based on blockchain  that aims to build decentralized autonomous platforms of high efficiency, in collaboration with the participating community that gets involved in the projects and which will also serve to establish a structure for social marketing.

It is our desire to provide the best service for our clients by building an accessible and friendly user platform.
name: Thanatos
